title: Tagging Workbench (Advanced)
content:
[[=]]
++ All fragment pages outside fragment:
[[/=]]
[[module ListPages tags="fragment" categories="-fragment" separate="no" perPage="250" order="created_at desc" prependLine="||~ Title ||~ Vis. Tags ||~ Hid. Tags ||~ Category ||"]]
|| **[[[%%link%%/noredirect/true | %%title%%]]]** || %%tags_linked%% || %%_tags_linked%% || %%category%% ||
[[/module]]

[[=]]
++ All unparented fragment pages.
[[/=]]
[[module ListPages tags="fragment" categories="*" parent="-" separate="no" perPage="250" order="created_at desc" prependLine="||~ Title ||~ Category ||"]]
|| **[[[%%link%%/noredirect/true | %%title%%]]]** || %%category%% ||
[[/module]]

[[=]]
++ All weird untagged pages.
[[/=]]
[[module ListPages tags="-fragment -admin -forum -component -theme -_theme-temp -workbench -sandbox -component-backend -more-by -artist -artwork" categories="-_default -protected -decomm -archived -adult -deleted -unlisted" separate="no" perPage="250" order="created_at desc" prependLine="||~ Title ||~ Vis. Tags ||~ Hid. Tags ||~ Category ||"]]
|| **[[[%%link%%/noredirect/true | %%title%%]]]** || %%tags_linked%% || %%_tags_linked%% || %%category%% ||
[[/module]]

[[=]]
++ All non-SCPs with attribute tags.
[[/=]]

[[module ListPages tags="-scp acoustic adaptive addictive airborne alive amorphous animal antimemetic apian appliance aquatic arachnid arboreal arthropod artistic artifact auditory automaton autonomous avian bacteria biohazard biological bovine building cadaver cactaceous camelid canine carnivorous cervine cephalopodic cetacean chelonian chemical city clay clockwork clothing cognitohazard compulsion computer concept contagion container corrosive currency crystalline cube dental document dinosaurian ectoentropic electrical electromagnetic electronic empathic engraved entropic equine exchange extradimensional extraterrestrial extremity feline fire food formic foundation-made fungus furniture future game gaseous genetic geological glass gravity gustatory hallucination hive-mind hostile humanoid immobile indestructible infohazard insect inscribed inscription instrument intangible invertebrate jewelry k-class-scenario key knowledge language lepidopteran leporine light liquid location loop magnetic map mathematical mechanical media medical memetic memory-affecting meta metallic metamorphic meteorological microscopic military mimetic mind-affecting miniature mobile moon murine musical narrative neurological nocturnal observational ocular olfactory omnivorous online ontokinetic ophidian organic ovine paradox parasitic performance physics photographic piscine plant planet polyhedral portal predatory predictive probability radioactive ranine reanimation recording religious reproductive reptilian ritual sapient satellite sciurine sculpture selachian self-repairing self-replicating sensory sexual sentient shadow simian skeletal sleep spacetime species sphere sport statue stone structure subterranean sun swarm tactile telekinetic telepathic teleportation temporal thermal thermodynamic timepiece tool toxic toy transfiguration transmission uncontained ursine vehicle vermian vibration virus visual vulpine weapon wooden xenarthran" separate="no" order="created_at desc" perPage="250" categories="*" prependLine="||~ Title ||~ Vis. Tags ||~ Hid. Tags ||"]]
|| **%%title_linked%%** || %%tags_linked%% || %%_tags_linked%% ||
[[/module]]

[[=]]
++ All non-supplements with supplement tags.
[[/=]]

[[module ListPages tags="-supplement experiment exploration incident interview" separate="no" order="created_at desc" perPage="250" categories="*" prependLine="||~ Title ||~ Vis. Tags ||~ Hid. Tags ||"]]
|| **%%title_linked%%** || %%tags_linked%% || %%_tags_linked%% ||
[[/module]]

[[=]]
++ GOI formats without a _tag.
[[/=]]
[[module ListPages tags="+goi-format -_alexylva -_ambrose-restaurant -_anderson -_are-we-cool-yet -_asci -_black-queen -_broken-god -_chaos-insurgency -_chicago-spirit -_daevite -_deer-college -_dr-wondertainment -_factory -_fifthist -_gamers-against-weed -_global-occult-coalition -_gru-division-p -_herman-fuller -_horizon-initiative -_ijamea -_mages-academy -_manna-charitable-foundation -_marshall-carter-and-dark -_medicea-accademia -_nobody -_oneiroi -_parawatch -_prometheus -_reclamation -_sapphire -_sarkic -_second-hytoth -_serpents-hand -_shark-punching-center -_three-moons-initiative -_unusual-incidents-unit -_wilsons-wildlife -_arcadia -_bonifay -_blackwood -_brothers-of-death -_children-of-the-torch -_children-of-the-night -_class-of-76 -_decommissioning-dept -_miscommunications -_ethics-committee -_obskura -_pangloss -_pattern-screamer -_pentagram -_pitch-haven -_professor-aw -_sugarcomb-confectionery -_xia-dynasty -_la-rue-macabre -_other" separate="no" perPage="250" order="created_at desc" prependLine="||~ Title ||~ Vis. Tags ||~ Hid. Tags ||"]]
|| **%%title_linked%%** || %%tags_linked%% || %%_tags_linked%% ||
[[/module]]

[[=]]
++ All _goi tags not on GOI Formats.
[[/=]]
[[module ListPages tags="-goi-format _alexylva _ambrose-restaurant _anderson _arcadia _are-we-cool-yet _black-queen _broken-god _chaos-insurgency _chicago-spirit _deer-college _factory _fifthist _global-occult-coalition _gru-division-p _herman-fuller _horizon-initiative _ijamea _la-rue-macabre _manna-charitable-foundation _marshall-carter-and-dark _medicea-accademia _nobody _oneiroi _other _prometheus _reclamation _sapphire _second-hytoth _serpents-hand _shark-punching-center _three-moons-initiative _unusual-incidents-unit _wilsons-wildlife" categories="*" separate="no" perPage="250" order="created_at desc" prependLine="||~ Title ||~ Vis. Tags ||~ Hid. Tags ||"]]
|| **%%title_linked%%** || %%tags_linked%% || %%_tags_linked%% ||
[[/module]]

[[=]]
++ Neutralized SCPs without a secondary class.
[[/=]]
[[module ListPages tags="+neutralized -safe -euclid -keter -thaumiel -esoteric-class" category="*" separate="no" perPage="250" order="created_at desc" prependLine="||~ Title ||"]]
|| **%%title_linked%%** ||
[[/module]]

[[=]]
++ Non-tales with Tale Style Tags 
May just be incompletely tagged
[[/=]]
[[module ListPages tags="-tale first-person second-person no-dialogue journal orientation worldbuilding foundation-format" category="*" separate="no" perPage="250" order="created_at desc" prependLine="||~ Title ||"]]
|| **%%title_linked%%** ||
[[/module]]

[[=]]
++ Cosmic Horror, Body Horror, Psychological Horror without Horror
[[/=]]
[[module ListPages category="*" separate="no" perPage="250" tags="cosmic-horror body-horror psychological-horror -horror" order="created_at desc" prependLine="||~ Title ||"]]
|| **%%title_linked%%** ||
[[/module]]

[[=]]
++ Black Comedy without Comedy
[[/=]]
[[module ListPages category="*" separate="no" perPage="250" tags="black-comedy -comedy" order="created_at desc" prependLine="||~ Title ||"]]
|| **%%title_linked%%** ||
[[/module]]

[[=]]
++ Akimoto's pages with images.
[[/=]]
[[module ListPages created_by="DrAkimoto" category="*" separate="no" perPage="250" tags="_image _cc" order="created_at desc" prependLine="||~ Title ||"]]
|| **%%title_linked%%** ||
[[/module]]
